text: "Barbarism Begins at Home" is a song by the English rock band the Smiths. Featured on their second studio album, Meat Is Murder (1985), it was given an initial limited release in Germany and Italy in April 1985 but was not released as a single in the UK until 1988. It is known for Andy Rourke's funk- inspired repetitive bassline synced with Johnny Marr's funk riff, with few alterations during the track. ==Track listing== ==External links== * Category:The Smiths songs Category:1985 singles Category:Songs written by Johnny Marr Category:Songs written by Morrissey Category:1985 songs Category:Rough Trade Records singles
